text:
Ranbir Kapoor Asking A Photographer 'Yeh Chappal Kahan Se Li' Proves He Loves Doing 'Ungli' Just Like Us!
Ranbir Kapoor Asking A Photographer 'Yeh Chappal Kahan Se Li' Proves He Loves Doing 'Ungli' Just Like Us!
What happens when you eye someone's nice footwear? Well, you directly ask them 'Kahan se liya' because obviously, there is no harm in knowing that. But who could have thought that Ranbir Kapoor, who is usually shy would do exactly the same.
Agencies
Well, Ranbir was being clicked by the paps at the Mumbai airport today and before they could probably ask him questions related to his and Alia's rumored engagement, he asked a pap "Yeh Chappal kahan se li", to which the pap replied “Andheri Station.”
Screengrab
While the video for sure is adorable, we are still wondering if it's a classic case of small talk gone wrong or if Ranbir was indeed in a casual-chatty mood. Take a look at the video right here.

title: Ranbir Kapoor Asking A Photographer 'Yeh Chappal Kahan Se Li' Proves He Loves Doing 'Ungli' Just Like Us!
